items.sentence: Did Tom say where he went for his summer vacation?
Did Tom say who was going to help him fix his car?
Did you see anyone else other than Tom last night?
Tom still isn\'t used to the way things work here.
The police are going to catch you sooner or later.
The police believe Tom was involved in the murder.
The police came as soon as they heard the gunfire.
Tom and Mary are the only Canadians who work here.
Tom and Mary walked on the beach in the moonlight.
Tom discussed politics all night with his friends.
